Articles.Content:
I was driving my rover around, when it hit an invisible wall and popped a couple of tires. Then...this happened.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hxwW7GI3yCA

What? Does anyone know what this is? At the very least can you tell me which Satanic spirit possessed it?
Seems like a reaction post to me. This belongs under support.
terrain boundry issue, you hit a seam

Why didn't you have the brake on to begin with? But yes, there are just spots of ground where mini-krakens live. I lost a rover on Vall because every time I loaded it with a quicksave, the right rear wheel would explode and send the rover tumbling. It does seem to be where one piece of terrain meets another.
Can you make a screenshot of your graphics settings?
